name: Swords n' Bullets
description:
*Only supports Xbox (360/One) Controllers

DESCRIPTION

A hardcore Bullet Hell where you only have a sword. Slice your way through hundreds of bullets to get to the boss, and switch between colors for extra damage!

GAMEPLAY
  • Switch between colors
  • Hit the correct color for extra damage
  • Destroy bullets to get to the boss!
CONTROLLERS

LS: Move
RS: Aim & Attack
RB: Change weapon color
X: Dash
LT: Slow movement

CREDITS

This game was created by Christopher Tåqvist as part of a course at Yrgo.

SPECIAL THANKS

Jesper Uddefors for inspiration for the bullet-pattern system.
